markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Laruhao](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1520)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 49

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 47

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 44
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 19">[Laruhao](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1520)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 41</row>

**Perception** +35; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43); [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +35, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +31, [Dancing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +38, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +37, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +34, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +39

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +8

**Con** +7

**Int** +7

**Wis** +7

**Cha** +9
</row>

**Items**
[Fighting Fan](/Weapons.aspx?ID=93), [_greater maestro's instrument_ (flute)](/Equipment.aspx?ID=260)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 43 

**Fort** +32 

**Ref** +29 

**Will** +35 

</row>

**HP** 360

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fighting fan +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=172), [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Monk](/Traits.aspx?ID=112)),
**Damage** 6d4+14 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
piercing note +35 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)),
**Damage** 4d10+17 sonic

**Bard Composition Spells** DC 41, 3 Focus Points
- **10th**
[House of Imaginary Walls](/Spells.aspx?ID=384), [Inspire Heroics](/Spells.aspx?ID=388), [Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386), [Inspire Defense](/Spells.aspx?ID=387)

**Call Dancers** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89)) Laruhao sends out a pulse of inviting melody that calls more yokai from the ether, restoring 30 Hit Points to the dancing night parade.

**Dance, Puppets, Dance!** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101)) Laruhao plays an invigorating melody that signals his horde to attack. The dancing night parade can use either Seiya! Soiya! or the two-action version of Wasshoi! Wasshoi! as a reaction.

**Master of Barriers**   Laruhao wishes for nothing more than to dance atop his yagura, undisturbed. When he uses his [house of imaginary walls](/Feats.aspx?ID=198) composition spell, he creates four 10-foot-by-10-foot walls in a cube around him. A creature must succeed at a DC 41 [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check to teleport within these walls; otherwise, the [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) attempt fails.

</column>
name: Laruhao

Dance, Puppets, Dance! Two Actions (Auditory, Linguistic) Laruhao plays an invigorating melody that signals his horde to attack. The dancing night parade can use either Seiya! Soiya! or the two-action version of Wasshoi! Wasshoi! as a reaction. Master of Barriers Laruhao wishes for nothing more than to dance atop his yagura, undisturbed. When he uses his house of imaginary walls composition spell, he creates four 10-foot-by-10-foot walls in a cube around him. A creature must succeed at a DC 41 counteract check to teleport within these walls; otherwise, the teleportation attempt fails.
